Html: I'm following the tutorials located here. If you read through the second tutorial (Direct-To-Disk recoding via the NAudio WaveMixerStream32 Class), you will see that the function WriteMixStreamOut is called within the Read() override function. However, when I run my program, nothing calls the Read function, thus nothing is recorded. How can I remedy this?
I didn't write that tutorial, but it has a link to sample code so I suggest you download that and follow it through in the debugger
